definition: a weight attached especially to an animal to hinder motion
something that shackles or impedes : encumbrance sense 1
a mass of material that blocks movement through a pipe or vessel
examples: clearing a clog in the kitchen sink

definition: a shoe, sandal, or overshoe having a thick typically wooden sole
to impede with a clog : hinder
to halt or retard the progress, operation, or growth of : encumber
examples: restraints that have been clogging the market
petty cases clogging up the courts

definition: to become filled with extraneous matter
to unite in a mass : clot
